This is repository for sdobox.

To install sdobox, add new repository to /etc/apt/sources.list:

deb http://sdobox.skydiveorbust.com/ sdobox main


And import key that is used to sign the release:

wget -qO - http://sdobox.skydiveorbust.com/pubkey.txt | sudo apt-key add -
sudo apt update
sudo apt install sdobox
